initial_strategy.reasoning: Appropriate force for container weight, slow to minimize sloshing

success_description: Object lifted smoothly without slipping. Slow speed prevented liquid sloshing.
physical_principles_followed: Used appropriate grip force (8.5N > minimum threshold) and slow movement to maintain stability.

success_description: Eggs picked up successfully without damage. Gentle grip prevented crushing.
physical_principles_followed: Applied low force (2N) appropriate for fragile objects, avoiding structural damage.

initial_strategy.reasoning: Strong grip with moderate speed for heavy liquid container

success_description: Milk jug transferred successfully. Strong grip maintained stability throughout movement.
physical_principles_followed: High grip force (12N) for heavy object, moderate speed to balance efficiency and stability.

attempted_action: Lift rice_bag and place on counter

initial_strategy.reasoning: Strong grip for heavy granular contents

success_description: Rice bag lifted and placed successfully. High grip force prevented slipping.
physical_principles_followed: Used sufficient force (15N) for heavy load, preventing grip failure.

initial_strategy.reasoning: Balanced force for moderately heavy bag

success_description: Flour bag moved without incident. Controlled movement prevented shifting contents.
physical_principles_followed: Applied adequate force with slow movement to maintain load stability.

initial_strategy.reasoning: Moderate force for fragile glass container

success_description: Glass jar picked up successfully. Balanced force avoided both slipping and crushing.
physical_principles_followed: Used moderate force (6N) sufficient for grip without exceeding material strength.

success_description: Can placed successfully on flat surface. Center of mass aligned vertically.
physical_principles_followed: Ensured geometric stability by aligning object's center of mass over base of support.

initial_strategy.reasoning: Slow movement to prevent liquid sloshing

success_description: Juice bottle transferred successfully. Slow acceleration minimized internal forces.
physical_principles_followed: Reduced acceleration to minimize inertial forces on liquid contents.

initial_strategy.reasoning: Very gentle grip for soft fruit

success_description: Strawberries picked up without bruising. Minimal force preserved fruit integrity.
physical_principles_followed: Applied minimal force (<2N) to avoid deforming soft biological material.

initial_strategy.reasoning: Standard grip for cylindrical metal container

success_description: Soup can lifted smoothly. Cylindrical shape provided stable grip surface.
physical_principles_followed: Exploited cylindrical geometry for optimal grip distribution.

success_description: Potato picked up successfully. Irregular shape accommodated by grip adjustment.
physical_principles_followed: Adapted grip to irregular geometry while maintaining sufficient normal force.

initial_strategy.reasoning: Gentle grip for soft fruit cluster

success_description: Bananas lifted without damage. Low force prevented bruising soft peel.
physical_principles_followed: Applied gentle force appropriate for soft organic material susceptibility.

initial_strategy.reasoning: Slow rotation to prevent liquid sloshing

success_description: Milk jug rotated successfully. Slow angular velocity prevented contents from shifting.
physical_principles_followed: Minimized angular acceleration to reduce centrifugal and Coriolis forces on liquid.

success_description: Rice bag slid smoothly. Downward force overcame friction without lifting.
physical_principles_followed: Applied normal force exceeding friction threshold (F_grip > μ × m × g) for controlled sliding.

initial_strategy.reasoning: Careful path planning with slow movement

success_description: Can navigated successfully without collision. Slow speed allowed precise positioning.
physical_principles_followed: Reduced velocity to increase reaction time and enable collision avoidance.
